trans-unit.source: Creates $tagMARGINS structure with specified left, right, top, and bottom retaining borders

seg-source.mrk: Creates $tagMARGINS structure with specified left, right, top, and bottom retaining borders

target.mrk: Creates $tagMARGINS structure with specified left, right, top, and bottom retaining borders

trans-unit.source: The width of the left border that retains its size.

seg-source.mrk: The width of the left border that retains its size.

target.mrk: The width of the left border that retains its size.

trans-unit.source: The width of the right border that retains its size.

seg-source.mrk: The width of the right border that retains its size.

target.mrk: The width of the right border that retains its size.

trans-unit.source: The height of the top border that retains its size.

seg-source.mrk: The height of the top border that retains its size.

target.mrk: The height of the top border that retains its size.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bottom border that retains its size.

seg-source.mrk: The height of the bottom border that retains its size.

target.mrk: The height of the bottom border that retains its size.

trans-unit.source: Returns $tagMARGINS structure that contains the specified retaining borders.

seg-source.mrk: Returns $tagMARGINS structure that contains the specified retaining borders.

target.mrk: Returns $tagMARGINS structure that contains the specified retaining borders.
